about_the_game:
The acclaimed Ala Mobile, after conquering the hearts of over 5000000 players on mobile, lands on PC to bring you a fast paced (up to 120+ fps if available!), entertaining Formula racing experience! Drive across different tracks from all over the world, in different weather conditions. 6 years of fine honing, listening to the feedbacks of thousands of players, to deliver you a fun and addictive Formula racing game!

Ala Mobile gives you everything you need from the get go. Powerful engines? You got it. Fully customizable setup? You got it. An efficient drag reduction system? You got it. Overtake mode? You got it. 
Cars are very important in motorsport. But drivers are always more important. Tailor your experience as you like it.

-Customizable Championship and Weekends;
-Time attack leaderboards;
-Online multiplayer head to head;

-Weekend tires assignment and Restricted Number Components;
-Full damage model;

-Full failures model;

-Safety car interventions;

-Free practices 1,2 and 3; 
-Q1, Q2 and Q3;

Cars and drivers data are totally customizable. So are cars liveries and drivers' helmets!
Two powerful editors will allow you to create from scratches liveries and helmets. You can also import and export projects and decals, in order to enrich the editors, and share your creations with your friends!
detailed_description:
The acclaimed Ala Mobile, after conquering the hearts of over 5000000 players on mobile, lands on PC to bring you a fast paced (up to 120+ fps if available!), entertaining Formula racing experience! Drive across different tracks from all over the world, in different weather conditions. 6 years of fine honing, listening to the feedbacks of thousands of players, to deliver you a fun and addictive Formula racing game!

Ala Mobile gives you everything you need from the get go. Powerful engines? You got it. Fully customizable setup? You got it. An efficient drag reduction system? You got it. Overtake mode? You got it. 
Cars are very important in motorsport. But drivers are always more important. Tailor your experience as you like it.

-Customizable Championship and Weekends;
-Time attack leaderboards;
-Online multiplayer head to head;

-Weekend tires assignment and Restricted Number Components;
-Full damage model;

-Full failures model;

-Safety car interventions;

-Free practices 1,2 and 3; 
-Q1, Q2 and Q3;

Cars and drivers data are totally customizable. So are cars liveries and drivers' helmets!
Two powerful editors will allow you to create from scratches liveries and helmets. You can also import and export projects and decals, in order to enrich the editors, and share your creations with your friends!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 450GTS
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 12+
  • Processor: Apple M1 and Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Ala Mobile

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4130T (2.9GHz) / AMD FX 6300 (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 (1GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с

short_description: The great indie success Ala Mobile is a Formula Racing game brought to you by a single developer. Race across different tracks from all over the world, tailor your gaming experience to your tastes with a huge degree of customization, but most of all, have fun!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
